{"id":1019802154,"question_id":3000,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10Â months","timestamp":1691897378,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"490 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1019802154/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Absolute Difference Between Elements With Constraint","memory":"59.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minAbsoluteDifference(List<Integer> nums, int x) {\n        \n        if(x==0)\n            return 0;\n        \n        int siz = nums.size();\n        \n        \n        int min = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n        \n        TreeMap<Integer, Integer> map = new TreeMap<>();\n        for(int n : nums){\n            map.put(n, map.getOrDefault(n, 0)+1);\n        }\n        \n        \n        for(int i=0;i<x; i++){\n            int n = nums.get(i);\n            map.put(n, map.get(n)-1);\n            if(map.get(n)==0)\n                map.remove(n);\n        }\n        \n        // System.out.println(map.keySet());\n        \n        \n        for(int i=0; i<siz-x; i++){\n            \n            int n = nums.get(i);\n            \n            Integer hi = map.ceilingKey(n);\n            Integer lo = map.floorKey(n);\n            \n            if(hi!=null){\n                min = Math.min(min, hi-n);\n            }\n            \n            if(lo!=null)\n                min = Math.min(min, n-lo);\n            \n            int rmval = nums.get(i+x);\n            map.put(rmval, map.get(rmval)-1);\n            if(map.get(rmval)==0)\n                map.remove(rmval);\n        }\n        \n        return min;\n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-absolute-difference-between-elements-with-constraint","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
